text: U.S. Route 75 is a major north-south U.S. Highway. It goes in the central United States. The highway's northern endpoint is in Noyes, Minnesota, at the Canadaâ€“US border. Its southern endpoint is at Interstate 30 and Interstate 45 in Dallas, where it is called North Central Expressway.Endpoints of US highways U.S. 75 was a cross-country route. It went from Canada to the Gulf of Mexico at Galveston, Texas. However, the entire part south of Dallas has not been used in favor of Interstate 45. That part became Texas State Highway 75. ==Related roads== * U.S. Route 175 * U.S. Route 275 ==References== ==Other websites== *Endpoints of US highway 75 - at usends.com Category:U.S. Highways
title: U.S. Route 75
